# `gstat` for [prompt](/commands/categories/prompt.md)

<div class='command-title'>Get the git status of a repo</div>

## Signature

```> gstat {flags} (path)```

## Flags

 -  `--no-tag`: Disable git tag resolving

## Parameters

 -  `path`: path to repo
